summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of the retro blocky gamified developer portfolio landing page. All core features are working correctly including hero section, navigation, coin counter, skills section with animated progress bars, projects section with 6 cards and dialogs, contact form, and footer. The pixel styling (3px borders, 0px radius, box shadows) is consistently applied across all interactive elements. Framer Motion animations are working on scroll and hover. Responsive design works on both mobile and desktop viewports. All fonts (Pixelify Sans, Press Start 2P, Figtree) are loaded correctly. No backend testing was required as this is a frontend-only portfolio page.
passed_tests: Hero section displays correctly with pixel avatar, name (ALEX DEVSON), title (FULL-STACK DEVELOPER), description, and two CTA buttons (VIEW PROJECTS and HIRE ME)
Navigation menu has 4 clickable links (ABOUT, SKILLS, PROJECTS, CONTACT) that scroll smoothly to respective sections
Coin counter is clickable, increments from 42 to 43, and shows toast notification when clicked
Skills section displays 4 skill cards with animated progress bars showing correct levels (90%, 85%, 75%, 95%)
Progress bars animate with Framer Motion from 0% to target percentage on scroll
Projects section displays all 6 project cards in a grid layout with titles, descriptions, tags, and coin counts
All 6 projects verified: Pixel Quest RPG (15 coins), AI Chat Bot (20 coins), E-Commerce Platform (25 coins), Weather Dashboard (10 coins), Task Manager Pro (18 coins), Portfolio Generator (22 coins)
Project cards are clickable and open a dialog with detailed project information, VIEW CODE and LIVE DEMO buttons
Dialog can be closed with Escape key
Contact form has 3 input fields (name, email, message) and submit button
Contact form submission shows success toast and clears form fields
Footer has three columns (About, Quick Links, Connect) with proper content
Footer has 3 social media icons (GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter) with hover effects
Footer navigation links work and scroll to correct sections
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Retro pixel styling is applied correctly: 3px borders on buttons, cards, and inputs
Box shadows (4px_4px_0_0 for buttons, 6px_6px_0_0 for cards) applied correctly
Rounded-none (0px border-radius) applied consistently
All three fonts loaded correctly: Pixelify Sans for headings, Press Start 2P for labels, Figtree for body text
Framer Motion animations work on scroll (skills section) and hover (buttons, cards)
Button hover states change background color correctly
Sticky header works and stays at top on scroll
Smooth scroll behavior enabled for navigation
Responsive design works on mobile viewport (390x844) - desktop nav hidden, hero section adapts
Responsive design works on desktop viewport (1920x1080) - all elements properly spaced
Pixel grid background present in hero section
Hero section uses correct gradient background (sky-blue to mint-green to cream)
All sections have proper spacing and layout
